About

My coding journey began in 2020 when I created an Autohotkey script that added the control + a / select all shortcut to Quickbooks Desktop. From there, I began utilizing Javascript in the Google Workspace ecosystem to extend Sheets. At the time, I worked for a small business in the home impovment industry as an operations manager. These early projects enabled me to catch user error and disseminate relevant information to accounting, the designer, and the customer effectively.

  • Sheets to Calendar: Navigating and transferring data between the QB, Calendar, and Sheets UI is slow and mistake-prone. I created an AHK script to pull CSV reports from QB for manual manipulation. This data could then be uploaded to a shared calendar. This solution eliminated simple human error when transferring lots of similar dates and skus repeatedly.
  • Margin Calculator: Determining a final price/sqft for a product can be tricky, especially while negotiating with a customer. Vendor-specific surcharges, shipping, material type, and customer tier all need to be factored into the final markup. I created a simple calulator UI with AHK that makes it simple for salespeople to determine a fair, but profitable price quickly.

I began learning web development full time starting January 2024.

Projects

Songbird 52

  • Goal: A static webpage advertising local, solo guitar performance.
  • Outlier Issue: The media the provided was hosted on Facebook and the client's profile was not relevent to his buisiness. I migrated them off Facebook and hosted them in an Amazon S3 bucket.
